So much better than I thought it was going to be! They have a great selection of sushi and a lot of other Asian cuisine. The restaurant is spacious and gives you a lot of options. If you're not a big fan of sushi they have many options for you. The sushi was a lot better than sushi I've had previously in Barcelona. It was pretty good! During the day, the buffet is €9.50 per person and then at night it gets more pricey, €15 I think? I definitely suggest going for the lunch price. Its worth it! The dinner price is a bit much and even more if you get water. Overall, I had a great time with friends going for lunch. I really liked it! And I was stuffed!
